hotels.title: Glamping Retreat Steps from Mimosa Rocks National Park on NSW's Sapphire Coast
hotels.description: When you want to get away from it all, without forgoing the comforts of home, head to Tanja Lagoon Camp for the ultimate glamping wilderness retreat steps from NSWâ€™s Mimosa Rocks National Park. On the edge of a wild coastal lagoon, surrounded by serene spotted gum forest, this hideaway invites you to escape, relax and immerse yourself in nature just 40 minutes from the coastal town of Merimbula. Stay in spacious tents that feature everything you need from a luxurious camping escape: fully stocked kitchenettes, private ensuites, and plush beds for a serene night's sleep. Enjoy canoeing and kayaking across the sparkling lagoon alongside the pelicans and swans, or lace up your walking shoes and follow bushwalking tracks through spotted gums and cycads towards Middle Beach. At night, the stargazing is spectacular - lie back and be mesmerised by the constellations. Come morning, wake to the sounds of rustling trees, red-necked wallabies snuffling for food, and the song of rainbow lorikeets.
